alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Southern Clark County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 10:31AM PST until December 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST /5 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts over 60 mph. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Deserts and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST /5 AM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Boating conditions will be deadly with large waves and high risk of capsizing vessels. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High winds will impact operations on Lake Mead and Mohave. Travelers on US 93 in Arizona as well as US 95 in southern Clark county will be difficult with risk of overturning for high profile vehicles. Strong winds and rain will make for poor visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Southern Clark County
